name: Sertanejo universitário
description: Modernized style combining rural themes and acoustic instrumentation with commercial production and Electronic instrumentation.

children.name: Arrocha sertanejo
children.description: Merged the Arrocha style with the younger audience creating a more energetic and more danceable rhythm.
